Lines: New mission came in, no time to bask in afterglow
of victory. I thought we'd participate in counter
offensive, but luckily its just a small operation.
DeepL_mtl: New mission came in, no time to bask in afterglowof victory. i thought we'd participate in counteroffensive, but luckily its just a small operation.

Lines: What a relief!
Why aren't we eploying MS as main
force of counter offensive?!
DeepL_mtl: What a relief!Why aren't we eploying MS as the main force of counter offensive?

Lines: Don't strain yourself, Lilly. Even units that
operated before us haven't been mobilised.
I guess we haven't reached combat readiness yet.
DeepL_mtl: Don't strain yourself, Lilly. even units thatoperated before we haven't been mobilised.I guess we haven't reached combat readiness yet.

Lines: But we fought so well the other day!
It swould have boosted our troops morale!
DeepL_mtl: But we fought so well the other day! It swould have boosted our troops morale!

Lines: Our previous victory was just due to surprise.
Enemy did not expect us to field MS, and was careless.
It can't be helped that army keeps is in back.
DeepL_mtl: Our previous victory was just due to surprise.Enemy did not expect us to field MS, and was careless.It can't be helped that army keeps is in back.

Lines: Hey, Hoa...
Are you saying we're not good enough?!
DeepL_mtl: Hey, Hoa.... .Are you saying we're not good enough?

Lines: Huh? Um... I guess so?
A pilot of your level should have
noticed that enemy was in confusion, right?
DeepL_mtl: Huh? Um... A pilot of your level should havenoticed that enemy was in confusion, right?

Lines: MNHGHGHGHGNNMM!!!!!!
(Whoaa...)
Oh that's right! Such experienced pilot as Lil
of course have noticed. Right? Lil? Hhahaha...
DeepL_mtl: (Whoaa...) Oh that's right! Such an experienced pilot as Lilof course has noticed.

Lines: I guess what Lil says is that we should keep
targeting enemy morale with our MS, just like
in last battle? Right, Lil? You're so thoughtful!'
DeepL_mtl: I guess what Lil says is that we should keeptargeting enemy morale with our MS, just likein last battle? Right, Lil? You're so thoughtful!

Lines: Hah, of course!
Great pilot is always thinking on both tactical
and strategic level! Hah, I was just testing you!
DeepL_mtl: Great pilot is always thinking on both tacticaland strategic level! Hah, I was just testing you!

Lines: Whoa, as expected of Lilly.
However, General Revil has to think of big picture.
I'm sure he thinks is not yet time to play our trump card.
DeepL_mtl: Whoa, as expected of Lilly.However, General Revil has to think of the big picture.I'm sure he thinks is not yet time to play our trump card.

Lines: Yes. Due to overextended front line,
Zeon forces are struggling with supplies...
DeepL_mtl: Yes. Due to overextended front line,Zeon forces are struggling with supplies....

Lines: Even if casualties are high, the thinking is that
we can win this operation just with sheer numbers.
I guess our part will come after that.
DeepL_mtl: Even if casualties are high, the thinking is thatwe can win this operation just with sheer numbers.I guess our part will come after that.

Lines: Ah, In order to do that we need to gain as much
experience as possible, and develop our trump card.
Well, time to head out! Everyone, preparie for sortie!
DeepL_mtl: Ah, In order to do that we need to gain as muchexperience as possible, and develop our trump card.Well, time to head out! Everyone, preparie for sortie!

Lines: Roger that!
